prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek body and long ears, radiating energy.
I want a Pokemon that can harness lightning, with a tail resembling a bolt.
Generate a playful creature with yellow fur and a cheerful demeanor, perfect for kids.
Make an adorable bipedal Pokemon that can generate static electricity, with a unique design.
Imagine a cute and energetic Pokemon that loves to play in grassy areas.
Design a strong yet friendly Pokemon that can easily adapt to urban environments.
Show me a Pokemon with striking features that can deliver powerful electric shocks.
